title: Developer Portfolio
tagline: A Clean Architecture showcase built with Flutter and Riverpod.
description: A high-performance, responsive web application designed to showcase technical proficiency. Built using strict Clean Architecture principles to ensure scalability and testability.

features.title: Clean Architecture
features.description: Strict separation of concerns into Domain, Data, and Presentation layers.

features.title: Responsive Layout
features.description: Adaptive UI that scales from mobile to 4K desktops.

title: FinTrack Pro
tagline: Personal finance management with real-time analytics.
description: A comprehensive mobile application for tracking personal expenses and income. Includes interactive charts for spending analysis and budget forecasting.

features.title: Real-time Sync
features.description: Instant data synchronization across devices using Firebase Firestore.

title: ShopFlow
tagline: Modern e-commerce platform with seamless checkout.
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution featuring product management, cart functionality, and secure payment processing with Stripe integration.

title: TaskMaster
description: A Kanban-style project management app with real-time collaboration, sprint planning, and team analytics dashboard.
